input.sentences: the coach took a moment with his team to talk strategy .
as they lined up for the game | they knelt on the ground .
there was an altercation that left a team member on the ground .
a whirlwind of orange socks was all the audience could see .
the white team had the ball and fought to keep it .
output.sentences: Coach is fussing at players because they aren't using their unique talents
Players are told to kneel at sideline and intently watch the game
A bit more effort is put forth by the white/red team, they are "in the game"
player has hustled after the ball
Players are working as a team, focused, and encouraging each other to prevail
